entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
